p.s: Hey , have you ever wished you could look fabulous all the time ?
Whatever you 're doing , going to school , going to work , on a date , out shopping , hitting the beach or hitting the gym - You can be constantly fabulous ! Just read this guide .

list.item:
Be confident
!
Stand tall and smile , or all of your hard work will go to waste .
Never stand in a corner or try to avoid attention or no one will notice how fabulous you look .

item.s: Have a clear face .
Use a product like Proactive if you have zits .
Make sure to wash your face daily , and that you are free of acne before attempting the next step , or you could cause a break-out .
Wash as often as you need , daily showers are the norm .
No one will care how fabulous you look if you smell like sweat !
Carry around a little make up pouch with you with your favorite products .
In your make up pouch , you should have at least your eyeliner , blush , lip gloss and mascara .
A comb or hairbrush helps too .
Also keep some deodorant and chapstick just in case .
Tie up your hair into a nice , cute ponytail or smooth it out before you step out of your house .
Change your hairstyle every once in a while .
Having the same hairstyle for the whole year can become a little dull and boring .
Try a bun or braid to jazz things up .
You can even go to the stylist and ask for a snip .
Do n't leave home without checking yourself in a mirror .
Check the mirror every few hours - you could just use your make-up mirror .
Do n't try this during class , or you could get into trouble .
Carry a big bag to put all of your essentials in .
It 's easier to carry just one bag , except for your make up pouch , which can be put into your big bag , and it looks more stylish , too .
If you do not need to wear a uniform , you do n't need to wear the same outfits to school .

Look at
making a capsule wardrobe
- a few pieces that can mix and match to many different outfits .
Try accessories .
Something simple like earrings , bangles , or a belt can change up a look from good to fabulous .

Be true to yourself and
your own style
.
Do n't listen too much to other people 's advice especially if it does n't sound like it will work .
Get a good night 's sleep every night .
This way you 'll look fresh in the morning .
Sleep also will reduce dark spots under the eyes .
Smell nice .
Shower in the morning and at night and wear perfume that you think smells great .
Do n't forget to smile .
It makes you feel fabulous , even on bad days .
Make sure your hair and skin are n't oily .
Try not to put hair gel as when it dries up , it looks like hair lice !
Do n't use foundation ; this causes break outs which is what you really want to avoid .
Always be yourself .
Do not change yourself for others .
